TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BindingCompleteState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the result of a completed binding operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState> is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> type.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete> event and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState>. To run this code, paste it into an empty code file.
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState DataError = int32(1)

Docs.summary: An indication that the binding operation failed with a data error.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState Exception = int32(2)

Docs.summary: An indication that the binding operation failed with an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState Success = int32(0)

Docs.summary: An indication that the binding operation completed successfully.
